title: Potential Buffer Overflow in SHGetFolderPath
description: The function SHGetFolderPath is used to retrieve the path of a special folder, but it does not check if the buffer size is sufficient. This can lead to a buffer overflow if the returned path exceeds MAX_PATH characters.
fix: Use the newer SHGetKnownFolderPath function which allows specifying the buffer size and returns an error code if the buffer is too small.
